[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1547844036558{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Capture15.jpg?id=1327) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Awards

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1548113097479{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

An award-winning diverse staffing firm

ATR has won a number of awards recognizing its business success and diversity and was previously crowned an NMSDC Supplier of the Year. At ATR, we create inclusive and innovative technologies that change lives every day, and that’s why we’re making the world a better place, one job at a time.

 

• 2022 SIA List of Diversity-Owned Staffing Firms
• 2022 Bronze Stevie® Award, Women-Run Workplace of the Year
• 2022 Ethics in Sales Award (The Stevie® Awards)
• 2021 SIA DE&I Influencers List: Angelique Alvarez
• 2021 Latinx Business Leadership Awards (Silicon Valley Business Journal)
• 2021 40 Under 40: President & CEO Andrea Brenholz (Silicon Valley Business Journal)
• 2020 Latino Business Leadership Award (Silicon Valley Business Journal)
• 2018 TAPFIN Top Partner Award
• 2018 #3 Largest woman-owned businesses in Silicon Valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)
• 2018 #3 Largest minority-owned businesses in Silicon Valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)
• 2018 #14 Largest Family-Owned Businesses in Silicon valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)
• 2018 #35 Largest private companies in Silicon Valley (Silicon Valley Business Journal)
• 2017 NMSDC National Supplier of the Year
•2017 National WRMSDC Supplier of the Year
• 2016 Top 100 Hispanic Owned Businesses
• 2016 DiversityBusiness.com Top Diversity Owned Business
• 2016 Hispanic Business Enterprise Elite Honoree by the United States Hispanic Chamber of Commerce
• 2016 United States Hispanic Chamber of Commerce Hispanic Business Enterprise Elite Honoree
• 2015 DiversityBusiness.com Top 500 Diverse Business
• 2015 WRMSDC Supplier of the Year
• 2014 & 2015 WRMSDC Volunteer of the Year
• 2014 NMSDC Regional Supplier of the Year

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1548″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Award Blogs

Winner of Sales Partnerships Ethics in Sales Award Announced

04.11.2022 | ATR International, Awards, Hiring Manager Blogs, Staffing

April 11, 2022: ATR International is proud to announce the company is a Stevie® Awards silver recipient winner of the Sales Partnerships Ethics in Sales Award. The Sales Partnerships Ethics in Sales Award recognizes organizations for best practices and achievements in demonstrating the highest ethical standards in sales. Nominees submitted specific examples, case studies, and […]

Read the Article

MSP Provider ATR International Receives Prestigious TAPFIN Award

06.04.2019 | ATR International, Awards, MSP

Santa Clara, CA – ATR International, a leading staffing and consulting firm, has received the prestigious TAPFIN Top Partner Award by being recognized as one of only 45 Premier Partners across North America. This distinction places ATR in the top 4% of MSP vendors. “We work hard at ATR to deliver first-class MSP services for […]

Read the Article

ATR Recognized on SIA’s Prestigious List of Diversity-Owned Staffing Firms

06.08.2022 | ATR International, Awards, Diversity, Staffing, Supplier Diversity

Santa Clara, CA – ATR International (ATR) has been named to the 2022 edition of Staffing Industry Analysts’ (SIA) list of diversity-owned staffing firms. The recognition on this year’s list, billed by SIA as “a great resource for the workforce solutions ecosystem,” is a direct reflection of ATR’s maturation into a diverse supplier of choice […]

Read the Article

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Don't just take our word for it

  • I have seen firsthand their commitment to the diversity community, exemplified in several ways. They have a dedicated diversity manager. They share their knowledge and experience with other MBEs. They also regularly attend and sponsor NMSDC national and regional events. I’ve been impressed with their commitment and results.

     

    -ATR Client

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

    Organizations We’re A Part Of

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1511″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1503″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1509″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1508″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

They share their knowledge and experience with other MBEs. They also regularly attend and sponsor NMSDC national and regional events. I’ve been impressed with their commitment and results.   -ATR Client
